subject: Basketball
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: For the Liberty and Coach Pat Coyle, a Rutgers women’s basketball alumna, adding Essence Carson is an opportunity for the team to improve on last year’s 16-18 record.
snippet: For the Liberty and Coach Pat Coyle, a Rutgers women’s basketball alumna, adding Essence Carson is an opportunity for the team to improve on last year’s 16-18 record.
